definition: Bing (search engine)
certainly/must/will/necessarily
surname Ying
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to grant whatever is asked for/to accede to every plea

sentences.english: It is impossible to satisfy all demands.
You can have for the asking all the peace you want.
sentences.chinese: 你若真心想要平靜，自當有求必應。

sentences.english: He gave good practical advice when (he was) asked.
sentences.chinese: 他有求必應，給出了好的可行性建議。

sentences.english: Once a prospect is generated, sales follow-ups are personalized and very soft touch.
sentences.chinese: 一旦產生預期，銷售跟進很個性化，而且有求必應。

sentences.english: This hotel advertises that it spoils its guests.
sentences.chinese: 該旅館做廣告說他們對顧客是有求必應。

sentences.english: She always gave the right answers.
Two, courtesy trest person, service enthusiasm, receive Li quick, have to beg surely should.
sentences.chinese: 禮貌待人，服務熱情，接禮迅速，有求必應。

sentences.english: When you're in a bad mood, your friend agrees with whatever you say.
sentences.chinese: 當你心情不好時，朋友對你有求必應。

sentences.english: That kind of responsiveness will get you a level of goodwill money won´t buy.
sentences.chinese: 有求必應將爲你實現商譽投資也無法實現的價值。

sentences.english: Mr Bing, unlike so many of his predecessors, is wonderfully frank.
sentences.chinese: 必應先生，和很多他的前任不同，爲人非常直率。

sentences.english: Need more information on the types of Instant Answers available on Bing?
sentences.chinese: 想知道必應上更多的“即時回答”的信息？
約瑟夫對妻子有求必應。

sentences.english: Just last month, Bing was still in 8th place.
sentences.chinese: 就在上個月，必應還排在第8的位置。

sentences.english: God was very good and gave His creatures what they asked.
sentences.chinese: 上帝真是太好了，他對他所創造的衆生有求必應。

sentences.english: Her father had never refused her anything.
sentences.chinese: 她父親對她素來是有求必應的。

sentences.english: English-language searces to Baidu will be redirected through Bing.
sentences.chinese: 由於必應加入，百度將重新定向英文搜索服務。

definition: efficacious/effective/(of a prediction) accurate/correct
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
to give one's assent/to consent
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
secret virtue
omniscient
to anger sb/to enrage
to decline (an appointment, invitation etc)
to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
safe and sound (idiom)
no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence
to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
in fear and trepidation (idiom); in reverence before your majesty (court formula of humility)
Yanshou county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang/to extend life
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
